price: 24. Waa si uu Alle uga abaal mariyo runlowyda runtooda, oo u cadaabo munaafiqiinta hadduu doono ama ugu toobad aqbalo. Hubaal Alle waa Denbi Dhaaf Badane, Naxariis Badan.
arabic: لِّيَجۡزِيَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلصَّٰدِقِينَ بِصِدۡقِهِمۡ وَيُعَذِّبَ ٱلۡمُنَٰفِقِينَ إِن شَآءَ أَوۡ يَتُوبَ عَلَيۡهِمۡۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ غَفُورٗا رَّحِيمٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: liyajziya al-lahu al-ṣādiqīna biṣid'qihim wayuʿadhiba al-munāfiqīna in shāa aw yatūba ʿalayhim inna al-laha kāna ghafūran raḥīman
